test_scenarios.name: Login - Successful Login
steps: Enter valid email address in the email field
Enter valid password in the password field
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the account summary page.

test_scenarios.name: Send Payment - Successful Payment
steps: Enter a valid recipient email address or phone number
Enter a valid amount to send
Select a payment method (e.g., PayPal Balance, linked bank account)
Review the payment details and click 'Send Payment Now'
test_scenarios.expected_result: Payment is successfully sent, and confirmation message is displayed.  Transaction appears in account history.

test_scenarios.name: Receive Payment - Check Payment Received
steps: Check account activity for recent incoming payments.
Verify the received payment details (sender, amount, date, and description if any).
test_scenarios.expected_result: The received payment is displayed in the account activity with correct details.
